TextEng: "Never mind."
"I think we need to part ways."
"Never mind, then. Stay with me."
Text: "그럼 신경 쓰지 마. 나와 함께 있어."

TextEng: "Wait here until I return."
"Go on. Maybe we'll meet later."
"I want to change your tactics."
"I don't want to change anything else right now."
"I want you to leave any traps that you see alone for now."
"I want you to disarm any traps that you see."
"Don't try to be stealthy anymore."
"Stay stealthy, but only until the next fight."
"Try to remain stealthy all the time."
"Don't help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 돕지 마."

TextEng: "Help me if I fail to open a locked door or chest."
Text: "잠긴 문이나 상자를 여는 데 실패하면 도와줘."

TextEng: "I want to change the distance you stay away from me."
Stay a long distance away.
Keep a medium distance.
Stay close.
"Go ahead and attack as soon as you see enemies."
"Defend me and don't attack until I do."
Text: "날 방어하고 내가 공격하기 전까지 공격하지 마."

TextEng: "I want to adjust your equipment."
"Can you identify my equipment?"
"What was it you wanted to say earlier?"
"Let's stop and talk for a moment."
"That's all for now."
"No, nothing else."
"How are you doing? Is anything wrong?"
"What do you plan to do after all this?"
Text: "이 모든 게 끝나면 뭘 할 계획이야?"

TextEng: "What else would you do?"
"No, I think you should travel on your own."
Text: "아니, 네 혼자 여행하는 게 좋을 것 같아."

TextEng: "So long as you're okay with Nathyrra being with me."
"Certainly. I'd be glad to have you join me."
"Do whatever you like. I won't stop you."
"You could always travel with me."
"Isn't your place at my side?"
"Not really. We don't need to spend every waking moment together."
Text: "별로. 매 순간을 함께 보낼 필요는 없어."

TextEng: "You think you could get away from me that easy?"
Text: "그렇게 쉽게 나한테서 벗어날 수 있을 것 같아?"

TextEng: "I'd gladly have you at my side, Valen."
"I don't want you to give up everything for me."
Text: "날 위해 모든 걸 포기하길 바라진 않아."

TextEng: "Whoa! Not so fast there!"
"You just let me worry about that."
"I am an adventurer. I don't have time for any of that just yet."
"Let's enjoy what we have now. We can worry about that later."
Text: "지금 우리가 가진 걸 즐기자. 나중에 걱정해도 돼."

TextEng: "Marriage and children sound wonderful... eventually."
"That depends. What do you think?"
"It's definitely too soon. We've only just met, practically!"
"Not at all. Let's get started right now."
"Tell me about your time on the surface."
"Such as?"
"You couldn't tell that they were evil?"
"I'm sure that could happen to anyone."
"Uh-oh..."
"What did you do?"
"I'm sure you did the right thing."
"You can't hide away forever."
"I'm sure you'll get the hang of it eventually."
"Most people aren't used to horned tieflings running around, anyhow."
Text: "대부분의 사람들은 뿔 달린 티플링이 돌아다니는 데 익숙하지 않으니까."

TextEng: "Sounds like it isn't safe to let you loose."
"Why not spare the paladin? It wasn't his fault."
Text: "왜 성기사는 살려주지 않았어? 그의 잘못이 아니었잖아."

TextEng: "What?! You killed them both?! How could you?!"
Text: "뭐?! 둘 다 죽였어?! 어떻게 그럴 수가?!"

TextEng: "How could you be so gullible?"
"Tell me how you escaped Grimash't."
"So what happened?"
"The tower was attacked? Wouldn't that put you more in danger?"
"So you escaped by pure luck?"
"So what came next?"
"Hmph. What's so useful about humanity?"
"I'd prefer a smart man, myself. Or a strong man."
Text: "난 똑똑한 남자가 좋아. 아니면 강한 남자."

TextEng: "That seems like a stupid thing to say."
"I think you are a good man, Valen."
"Are you afraid you'll die alone?"
"But isn't the demonic part of you useful?"
Text: "하지만 네 안의 악마 부분은 유용하지 않아?"

TextEng: "Do you ever fear you will lose your humanity again?"
"How could you defeat a demon you yourself said was so powerful?"
Text: "네가 그렇게 강력하다고 말한 악마를 어떻게 물리쳤어?"

TextEng: "Did Grimash't come after you?"
"You enjoyed it?"
"And so you went straight to the Seer?"
"Just how old are you?"
"How can you not know?"
"How did you get out of the Abyss, then?"
"What kind of favor?"
"Maybe you could... show me?"
"Tell me more about your time in the Abyss."
"Well, if you're embarrassed, you needn't bother..."
"I'm bored. It should pass the time."
"I'm curious. I find your past interesting."
"That's all I wanted to know."
"Have you ever... been in love?"
"Just answer the question and stop evading."
"It's just a simple question. What's the harm?"
"You don't need to answer it if you don't want to."
"That figures."
"Who was she?"
"And there has been no-one else since?"
"That's all I wanted to know."
"And that's it? You just forget about her?"
"You didn't even try to save her?"
"I'm very sorry."
"How is it that you didn't die during all that?"
"Only a fool doesn't question what happens to him."
Text: "자신에게 일어난 일을 의심하지 않는 건 바보뿐이야."

TextEng: "Well, I'm thankful you're here too."
"Neither would I, if I were you."
"Perhaps the gods were watching over you?"
"Were there many others like you in the Abyss?"
"What did you do before you were taken captive?"
"I want to ask you something else."
"How did you get captured?"
"So you were a thief?"
"It could not have been easy."
"I guess you did what you had to."
"So you not only stole but you were proud of it? How typical."
"How did your mother die?"
"You don't believe that?"
"Maybe it was better that way."
"Did you ever get revenge on her?"
"That sounds terrible!"
"What did she do?"
"I'm sorry."
"What is Sigil? I've never heard of it."
"How do the drow feel about your leadership?"
"It seems surprising they would even agree to listen to you."
Text: "그들이 네 말을 들으려 한다는 것만으로도 놀라운데."

TextEng: "Someone with a handsome set of horns?"
"I know what a tiefling is."
"So tell me what a tiefling is, then."
"Not at all, you're quite handsome."
"No, I don't think so."
"Yes, of course."
"It does. I knew there was something off about you."
"No, that's not necessary."
"I didn't realize you'd had military engagements."
"You probably saved them, then. I'm impressed."
"So you've never actually won a battle, then?"
Text: "그럼 실제로 전투에서 이긴 적이 없는 거야?"

TextEng: "What happened then?"
"I don't need to hear about it."
"It didn't go well?"
"Maybe that would be best."
"Does your blood make you evil?"
"I don't like the sound of that at all."
"Then I will have to keep a close eye on you."
"Then I will judge you on your actions."
"If you're struggling, then that's all I can ask."
"Actually, I find it quite intriguing."
"I judge a man by his actions, not his blood."
"No. Should it?"
"Doesn't that make your job more difficult?"
"So why do you care what happens to them?"
Text: "그럼 왜 그들에게 무슨 일이 일어나든 신경 써?"

TextEng: "And you don't?"
"I want to know more about you."
"What do you want to know?"
"Then never mind."
"No, not yet. Stay here."
"Yes, come along."
"This isn't a good time, Valen."
"Certainly, Valen. What would you like?"
"Well, keep control of yourself!"
"What do you mean?"
"Well, if you get us killed, I'm not raising you!"
Text: "뭐, 우릴 죽게 만들면, 되살리지 않을 거야!"

TextEng: "Just keep control of yourself."
"Yes, you'd think they'd have the same trouble as you."
Text: "그래, 그들도 너와 같은 문제를 겪을 거라 생각할 텐데."

TextEng: "Are you going to be able to hold out?"
"Maybe you're right. Maybe you should stay here."
"No, forget it. I'm not leaving you here."
Text: "아니, 됐어. 널 여기 두고 갈 수 없어."

TextEng: "You'd be willing to do that? I'm grateful, but there's no need."
"Yes, perhaps that's for the best."
"I need you with me. You're not staying behind."
"I'm not going to leave you in the Hells. Don't be absurd."
Text: "지옥에 널 두고 갈 수 없어. 말도 안 돼."

TextEng: "I'm not leaving you behind, my love. Ever."
Text: "널 두고 가지 않을 거야, 내 사랑. 절대로."

TextEng: "This isn't some sappy confession, is it?"
"Just spit it out already."
"And why should I care what you think, exactly?"
Text: "내가 네 생각을 왜 신경 써야 하지?"

TextEng: "Are you joking? I only helped you because of the geas."
"They can all die. And you with them, for that matter."
"I do want to stop Mephistopheles, that's true."
"I want to get out of the Hells. That's it."
"I have a reward coming to me. That's all I care about."
"Thank you. I would have helped even if it wasn't for the geas."
"We've still got Mephistopheles to deal with."
"Don't be an idiot. You're here to assist me, that's all."
Text: "바보같이 굴지 마. 넌 날 돕기 위해 여기 있는 거야, 그게 다야."

TextEng: "We're hardly friends, Valen."
"Friends? Certainly. I'd like that."
"I'd be willing to be more than just friends, if you would."
"You think you can do better than me? Hah!"
Text: "나보다 나은 사람을 찾을 수 있다고 생각해? 하!"

TextEng: "I see. Have it your way, then."
"It's all right. I understand."
"Take off that armor and we could get even closer."
Text: "그 갑옷 벗으면 더 가까워질 수 있을 텐데."

TextEng: "I know. I was only joking, Valen."
"Oh, all right. Go ahead, spoilsport."
"That's too bad. I feel nothing for you at all."
"I... think of you only as a friend, Valen. I'm sorry."
"Well..."
"Of course."
"I feel close to you too, Valen."
"I... don't know how I feel, Valen. It's too soon..."
Text: "난... 어떻게 느끼는지 모르겠어, 발렌. 너무 빨라..."

TextEng: "And I love you, Valen."
"We still have much to do. Dealing with Mephistopheles, for starters."
Text: "아직 할 일이 많아. 우선 메피스토펠레스를 상대해야 하고."

TextEng: "What do you see happening between us, Valen?"
Text: "우리 사이에 무슨 일이 일어날 거라고 생각해, 발렌?"

TextEng: "Close in what way?"
"What's that?"
"Is that such a terrible thing?"
"I've never given it too much thought, really."
Text: "사실 그것에 대해 많이 생각해본 적 없어."

TextEng: "Not really. I've never believed in much of anything."
"Yes, I am. I am faithful to my deity, if you must know."
"You have your opinion, I have my faith. Let us leave it at that."
Text: "넌 네 의견이 있고, 난 내 신앙이 있어. 그걸로 하자."

TextEng: "No, I don't find it offensive at all."
"That depends. Are you planning on leaving?"
"No? Why would you stay if you love the planes?"
"Then you should at least learn all you can about us."
Text: "그럼 최소한 우리에 대해 배울 수 있는 건 다 배워야 해."

TextEng: "Then you should adapt to our ways."
"You can't change who you are, Valen."
"I don't think there's any harm in learning our ways."
Text: "우리 방식을 배우는 데 해가 될 건 없다고 생각해."

TextEng: "Yes, I'd like that very much."
"No, I don't need you with me any longer than necessary."
Text: "아니, 필요 이상으로 너와 함께 있을 필요 없어."

TextEng: "Do what you want. I won't stop you."
"Why are you asking me?"
"Ask someone else."
"A god is still more powerful than you could conceive of, no?"
Text: "신은 여전히 네가 상상할 수 있는 것보다 강력하잖아, 안 그래?"

TextEng: "I think you don't know what you are talking about."
"Of course. I am a servant to my deity. Did you not know that?"
"Let's hear it, then."
"I don't want your stupid apology."
"An apology? For what?"
"And? That's it?"
"Oh, never mind. I suppose it'll do."
Text: "오, 신경 쓰지 마. 그 정도면 될 것 같아."

TextEng: "I want you on your knees, fool."
"Is *that* how you apologize to a woman?"
"Perhaps. For a kiss."
"Yes, I am. You're off the hook... this time."
"Maybe a little."
"Of course not!"
"All right, fine. You're off the hook."
"I think I deserve more of an apology then that."
Text: "그것보다 더 제대로 된 사과를 받을 자격이 있다고 생각해."

TextEng: "Hah! Forget it."
"Thank you. Yes."
"Thank you, Valen. I appreciate your candor."
"What do you know about him?"
"What makes you think I won't betray you?"
"Of course not. You still don't know me, however."
Text: "물론 아니지. 하지만 넌 여전히 날 모르잖아."

TextEng: "No. Forget it."
"Yes, I suppose so."
"Not really. I just don't like you."
"If I could get rid of this geas, damn right I would."
Text: "이 기아스를 없앨 수 있다면, 당연히 그럴 거야."

TextEng: "You can stuff your apology. I don't need it."
"Well, I don't want to talk about her."
"Yes, I really wish to ignore you."
"What could be so important? You still think I will betray her?"
Text: "뭐가 그렇게 중요해? 아직도 내가 그녀를 배신할 거라고 생각해?"

TextEng: "Fine, go on. I was only joking."
"Good. I have a few questions about her, myself."
Text: "좋아. 나도 그녀에 대해 몇 가지 질문이 있어."

TextEng: <StartAction>[Groan]</Start> "What for? Why now?"
"Why? Do you still think I will betray her?"
Text: "왜? 아직도 내가 그녀를 배신할 거라고 생각해?"

TextEng: "Is this a gender thing? Like how all men are pigs?"
Text: "이거 성별 문제야? 모든 남자가 돼지라는 식으로?"

TextEng: "You'd be correct. I have no idea what that is."
"I know what the Blood Wars are."
"How were you recruited?"
"How long did this go on?"
"I'm so sorry. That sounds terrible."
"Continue your tale."
"She came to the Abyss?"
"What happened next?"
"Oh. I didn't realize you had *that* kind of relationship."
"And this is what was so important to tell me?"
"Good for you. Thanks for the tip."
"I understand, Valen. We all do what we must."
Text: "이해해, 발렌. 우리 모두 해야 할 일을 하는 거니까."

TextEng: "I am not going to betray anyone, Valen. You have to trust me."
Text: "누구도 배신하지 않을 거야, 발렌. 날 믿어야 해."

TextEng: "Are we back to that again?"
"By turning you into her personal bodyguard?"
"Your master didn't try to get you back?"
"I see where this is going. Hurry up."
"That can't have been easy, considering where you were."
Text: "네가 있던 곳을 생각하면 쉽지 않았을 거야."

TextEng: "But she hadn't even done anything to you."
"Why did you fight if you didn't like it?"
"Perhaps I could answer that by killing you."
Text: "아마 널 죽임으로써 대답할 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "That's a rude question, isn't it?"
"What do you mean?"
"According to your Seer, I'm the one who can win."
Text: "네 선견자에 따르면, 내가 이길 수 있는 사람이야."

TextEng: "What is your point, Valen?"
"If you feel the need to brood, do it elsewhere."
"I'll get the job done no matter what you or she thinks."
Text: "너나 그녀가 뭐라고 생각하든 일은 끝낼 거야."

TextEng: "You don't believe in her visions?"
"Meaning what?"
"I admire your dedication."
"That's very presumptuous of you."
"And how would I do that while I'm under this geas?"
Text: "그리고 이 기아스에 걸려 있는데 어떻게 그럴 수 있겠어?"

TextEng: "Absolutely. I'll break this geas if it's the last thing I do."
"I don't know."
"No. I said I would do this, and I will."
"I'd leave. This has nothing to do with me, as far as I'm concerned."
Text: "떠날 거야. 내가 보기엔 나랑 아무 상관 없어."

TextEng: "Maybe not. I just don't like being forced into anything."
"I don't care what happens to the drow. I'm here to stop the Valsharess."
Text: "드로우에게 무슨 일이 일어나든 상관없어. 난 발샤레스를 막으러 왔어."

TextEng: "You think I would betray them?"
"If you don't trust me so much, then why are you here?"
Text: "그렇게 날 믿지 못한다면, 왜 여기 있어?"

TextEng: "Yes, I have. Go on, get out of here."
"I need a companion I can trust."
"No. Have you?"
"What do you want from me? My word I won't betray you?"
"No."
"Yes."
"I can't do anything while I'm under the geas, anyhow."
Text: "어차피 기아스에 걸려 있는 동안은 아무것도 할 수 없어."

TextEng: "Maybe it is."
"I didn't ask to be put in charge."
"It's a duty I shall see through to the end, I promise you."
"Stopping the Valsharess is the only thing that's important."
"I'm not here to help anyone. What if I refuse?"
Text: "누구를 도우러 온 게 아니야. 거부하면 어떻게 되는데?"

TextEng: "Doesn't it mean anything to you? Your Seer is the one who put me in charge."
Text: "아무 의미도 없어? 네 선견자가 날 책임자로 임명했잖아."

TextEng: "I'll do the best I can. Like I said, I didn't ask for this."
Text: "최선을 다할게. 말했듯이, 이걸 원한 적 없어."

TextEng: "Do you see any forces? What am I in charge of?"
"And if I refuse?"
"That's a little dramatic, isn't it?"
"Besides my charm and beauty?"
"You seem almost sad."
"We don't have time to get into this, Valen."
"Let's go."
<StartAction>[Deekin]</Start> "Ixthyria the Scalesinger..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Believe in yourself, Deekin."
"You're kind, you're talented, you're funny. You don't need me anymore. If I die, you'll be all right."
Text: "넌 친절하고, 재능 있고, 재미있어. 더 이상 날 필요로 하지 않아. 내가 죽어도, 넌 괜찮을 거야."

TextEng: "Not if I can help it. Come, we have an adventure to finish."
Text: "내가 도울 수 있다면 그렇지 않아. 와, 끝내야 할 모험이 있어."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me, little one!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
<StartAction>[Aribeth]</Start> "Va'ardalia the Twinsouled..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "You are right. I will not ask that of you."
"Don't you see? This is your atonement... It's all right..."
"I just don't want to see you suffer so."
Text: "그저 네가 그렇게 고통받는 걸 보고 싶지 않을 뿐이야."

TextEng: "Yes, Aribeth. Dead and cold..."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue evil, not good."
"I command you to love me..."
"Nothing. Never mind..."
"Feel no guilt regarding what transpired in Neverwinter."
Text: "네버윈터에서 일어난 일에 대해 죄책감을 느끼지 마."

TextEng: "Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no..."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I command you to pursue good, not evil."
"I command you to love me!"
"That is all, Aribeth."
<StartAction>[Nathyrra]</Start> "Qeyifalia the Skyseeker..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"Yes, I am sure."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Your anger is nothing to me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "네 분노는 내게 아무것도 아니야. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"Forgive yourself for your past crimes."
"I won't do anything to harm you, Nathyrra."
Text: "너에게 해가 되는 건 하지 않을게, 나시라."

TextEng: <StartAction>[Valen]</Start> "Oeskathine the Demonwrestler..."
"Nothing right now."
"Surrender your soul to me!"
"If it means losing you, then no."
"We're done. For now."
"Sorry, my love, but this is it for us."
"Yes, I am."
"I bind you to me as my lover forever!"
"Well... perhaps not."
"You heard me."
"You don't frighten me. I own you, body and soul."
Text: "날 겁주지 못해. 널 소유하고 있어, 몸과 영혼을."

TextEng: "You're so sexy when you're mad. Give me a kiss!"
"I hereby free you from your infernal taint."
"You're welcome."
"Glad you like it. Now give me your soul."
Text: "마음에 들어서 다행이야. 이제 네 영혼을 내게 줘."

TextEng: "Good. Now, in repayment, you are to be become my lover forever."
Text: "좋아. 이제, 보답으로, 넌 영원히 내 연인이 되는 거야."

TextEng: "So there's hope for us after all?"
"Does it really feel that different?"
"I'm glad. You certainly earned it."
"Right. You fear for your humanity. Losing hope. Got it."
Text: "그렇지. 네 인간성을 두려워하는구나. 희망을 잃고. 알겠어."

TextEng: "I just want to get to Mephistopheles, that's all."
"I'm just a little tired of your whining."
"I am your friend, Valen. But I can't help you with this."
Text: "난 네 친구야, 발렌. 하지만 이건 도와줄 수 없어."

TextEng: "I am your friend. I'm sorry."
"Hasn't the Seer helped you overcome this?"
"Enough chatter. I want to find Mephistopheles."
"It will get better, in time."
"I can help you with that, if you let me."
"Doesn't our love give you any hope at all?"
"I don't know, Valen."
"Not if you keep whining like this."
"Let's just take each day as it comes, Valen."
"There's always hope."
"The Reaper has always referred to it as his realm, nothing else."
Text: "사신은 항상 그것을 자신의 영역이라고 부를 뿐이야."

TextEng: "He's an ally. That's all you need to know."
"I don't know what he is. A demon, perhaps? He just is."
"Enough questions. The Reaper is an ally. That's all you need to know."
Text: "질문은 그만. 사신은 동맹이야. 그것만 알면 돼."

TextEng: "No... not really. He said something about a nexus, but I didn't really get it."
Text: "아니... 별로. 경계 영역에 대해 뭐라고 했는데, 잘 이해 못 했어."

TextEng: "This place is a nexus, or so the Reaper says. I'm not sure I understand it all."
Text: "이곳은 경계 영역이라고, 사신이 그러는데. 전부 이해하는지 확신이 안 서."

TextEng: "The Reaper says his realm is a nexus. It connects to many places, but not all."
Text: "사신은 자신의 영역이 경계 영역이라고 해. 많은 곳과 연결되지만, 전부는 아니야."

TextEng: "Why don't you ask him yourself?"
"Are you done yapping? I'd like to try and find a way out of here."
Text: "떠들기 끝났어? 여기서 나갈 방법을 찾고 싶은데."

TextEng: "So you must know something about this place?"
"If you don't attack, maybe they won't."
"Seems a bit... cold to be the Hells, doesn't it?"
"What was your first clue?"
"That's very helpful. What would I do if you weren't here to point out the blatantly obvious?"
Text: "정말 도움이 되네. 네가 여기서 뻔한 걸 지적하지 않았다면 어쩔 뻔했어?"

TextEng: "Then we'd better check it out first."
"If they try anything, I'll slaughter them all!"
"When I hack my way to the Elder Brain, it'll negotiate with me!"
Text: "엘더 브레인까지 베고 가면, 나랑 협상할 거야!"

TextEng: "What could I use to protect my mind?"
Text: "내 정신을 보호하는 데 뭘 쓸 수 있을까?"

TextEng: "What about your mind?"
"Then we shouldn't have any problems."
"If you were my thrall, would you have to cook and clean for me?"
Text: "네가 내 노예라면, 날 위해 요리하고 청소해야 해?"

TextEng: "And if I like my men dark and brooding?"
"Sounds like you'd be fun to tame."
"Enough of this. Let's just move on."
"I didn't mean it that way. Don't be so damned defensive!"
Text: "그런 뜻이 아니었어. 그렇게 방어적으로 굴지 마!"

TextEng: "You're very cute when you're angry."
"My! You're not only moody, you're defensive too!"
"I've noticed that about you."
"It wasn't a compliment. Believe me. Let's just move on."
"No. You're just sullen and suspicious, most of the time."
"Yes, it was a compliment. I think you'd be fun to tame."
"This helmet will protect me from them."
"I'm not afraid of a few zombies!"
"You think the undead are inside the temple?"
"Must you prattle on about unimportant things?"
"Whatever we find, I'll destroy it!"
"Don't worry, I'll be careful in there."
"Do you think it's some kind of trap?"
"They're probably slaves, then."
"We won't get to the bottom of this by standing here."
Text: "여기 서 있어서는 이걸 끝까지 알아낼 수 없어."

TextEng: "We'll have to investigate to find out."
"Maybe they aren't what they appear."
"So what? Who cares?"
"Good. Now we don't have to worry about an enemy's spell killing us."
Text: "좋아. 이제 적의 주문이 우릴 죽일까 걱정 안 해도 돼."

TextEng: "A dead magic zone? How is that possible?"
"Maybe we'll learn more about them if we look around."
Text: "둘러보면 그들에 대해 더 알 수 있을 거야."

TextEng: "Maybe some long forgotten race left them here."
Text: "어쩌면 오래 잊혀진 종족이 여기 남겨둔 걸 수도."

TextEng: "Come on. The sooner we find the Eye Tyrant, the sooner this is over."
Text: "가자. 이 눈알 폭군을 빨리 찾을수록, 빨리 끝나."

TextEng: "What's the matter? Are you scared?"
"There might be slaves in here, too."
"Don't worry, I'll keep my eyes peeled."
"Oh ho ho."
"Are you getting frightened, tiefling?"
"I haven't run into anything I can't handle, yet."
Text: "아직 감당 못 할 것과 마주친 적 없어."

TextEng: "Nobody said this was going to be easy."
Text: "이게 쉬울 거라고 아무도 말 안 했어."

TextEng: "I'd like to go into the dungeon now. That is, unless you have some more useless advice you want to pass on."
Text: "이제 던전에 들어가고 싶어. 쓸모없는 조언 더 하고 싶은 게 아니라면 말이야."

TextEng: "I'll be careful."
"You think I'm special? I think you're special, too."
Text: "내가 특별하다고 생각해? 나도 네가 특별하다고 생각해."

TextEng: "I'll be careful."
"So how are we supposed to cross it?"
"You think this river will stop the army of the Valsharess?"
Text: "이 강이 발샤레스의 군대를 막을 거라고 생각해?"

TextEng: "No need. I am well aware of the Underdark's nature."
"I think I have a good idea already, thank you."
"I'd be glad to hear what you know."
"I would hope you'd do the same for me."
"Yes. Let's go."
"Stay here for now."
"It's not your fault. Don't worry about it."
"Keep dying and I may decide otherwise."
"I need your combat skills. Don't let it happen again."
Text: "네 전투 기술이 필요해. 다시는 그러지 마."

TextEng: "I would never leave you behind, my love."
Text: "널 두고 가지 않을 거야, 내 사랑."
